subject: Issue
description_text:
﻿Hello
My order =SSN5029 its still not deliver
Today i check the tracker and surprise…..the order was in Budapest and now its back in China … Why???
From 1 January i need to pay 50 euro extra for all the pack from China
I realy don’t like this
I also atach the screenshot’S
Vlad-Ionut Ilea

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 9557 中
